game.name: Final Word Royale
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Think fast, spell faster — your life depends on it. Join the deadly 40 player word battle royale, Solve word puzzles or face brutal consequences. Only one will remain.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Think fast, spell faster — your life depends on it. Join the deadly 40 player word battle royale, Solve word puzzles or face brutal consequences. Only one will remain.
